game.name: Desktop Girl Chika
game.categories: Single-player, Captions available, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: On your desktop, Chika is not a passive decoration, but a presence with emotions, memory, and independent judgment. You are not “controlling” her; you are accompanying her growth—through time, interaction, and choice, giving her a complete and unique life.
